title: Which artist sang the song 'Goodbye Blue Sky'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pink Floyd from the album The Wall. Written by Roger Waters. One of my favorites! David Gilmour’s acoustic work and the song in general lends an air of menace and signals “Pinks” descent into madness. As Pink thinks of his father's death in the war he continues to build “the wall” inside his mind to protect himself from the realities of the world.
